author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1515.  Add MultiFileInputFormat, which packs multiple files per split.  Contributed by Enis Soztutar.

author: lresende
msg: Adding capability for post processing a contribution. The postProcesor interfaces were available before, but contribution was not integrated and calling these apis for each contribution.

author: mmarinschek
msg: TOMAHAWK-1033: enabled partial triggers to start a periodical update - including a new example. thanks to Stefan Schuster
